statements: SELECT * FROM reviewers;
SELECT reviewer_name, reviewer_id FROM reviewers;
SELECT reviewer_name, assigned_manuscripts FROM reviewers WHERE reviewer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM reviewers WHERE reviewer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT reviewer_id, reviewer_name FROM reviewers ORDER BY reviewer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM reviewers WHERE reviewer_id = 1;
SELECT reviewer_name, reviewer_id FROM reviewers WHERE reviewer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT reviewer_id, reviewer_name FROM reviewers ORDER BY reviewer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM reviewers WHERE assigned_manuscripts IS NOT NULL;
SELECT reviewer_id, reviewer_name, assigned_manuscripts FROM reviewers WHERE reviewer_name LIKE '%son%' ORDER BY reviewer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Reviewers;
SELECT reviewer_name, assigned_manuscripts FROM Reviewers ORDER BY reviewer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Manuscripts WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY manuscript_id ASC;
SELECT manuscript_id, author_name FROM Manuscripts WHERE editor_id = 2;
SELECT manuscript_title, author_name FROM Manuscripts WHERE author_name LIKE 'John Smith%';
SELECT * FROM Reviewers WHERE reviewer_id = 1;
SELECT reviewer_name, COUNT(*) FROM Reviewers GROUP BY reviewer_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT manuscript_title, author_name FROM Manuscripts WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT reviewer_name, manuscript_title FROM Reviewers JOIN Manuscripts ON Reviewers.reviewer_id = Manuscripts.editor_id;
SELECT reviewer_name, manuscript_title FROM Reviewers JOIN Manuscripts ON Reviewers.reviewer_id = Manuscripts.editor_id WHERE Reviewers.reviewer_id = 2;
SELECT reviewer_name FROM reviewers;
SELECT * FROM manuscripts WHERE editor_id IS NULL;
SELECT manuscript_title, author_id FROM manuscripts WHERE manuscript_id < 10;
SELECT * FROM manuscripts ORDER BY manuscript_title DESC;
SELECT reviewer_name, manuscript_title FROM reviewers INNER JOIN manuscripts ON reviewers.reviewer_id = manuscripts.author_id;
SELECT * FROM reviewers WHERE reviewer_id = 1;
SELECT manuscript_title, author_id, editor_id FROM manuscripts WHERE manuscript_id = 5;
SELECT reviewer_name, assigned_manuscript FROM reviewers ORDER BY reviewer_name DESC;
SELECT manuscript_title FROM manuscripts WHERE author_id = 3 AND editor_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT editor_name FROM editors WHERE editor_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM reviewers;
SELECT reviewer_id, reviewer_name FROM reviewers WHERE access_level > 2;
SELECT manuscript_id, title, author_id, editor_id FROM manuscripts WHERE manuscript_id = 1;
SELECT author_name, email FROM authors ORDER BY author_name ASC;
SELECT editor_name FROM editors WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM reviewers;
SELECT reviewer_id, reviewer_name, email FROM reviewers WHERE access_level > 2;

SELECT manuscripts.title, authors.author_name, editors.editor_name FROM manuscripts JOIN authors ON manuscripts.author_id = authors.author_id JOIN editors ON manuscripts.editor_id = editors.editor_id;
SELECT reviewers.reviewer_name, manuscripts.title FROM reviewers JOIN manuscripts ON reviewers.reviewer_id = manuscripts.editor_id ORDER BY reviewers.reviewer_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*), author_name FROM manuscripts JOIN authors ON manuscripts.author_id = authors.author_id GROUP BY author_name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM reviewers WHERE reviewer_id = 1
SELECT reviewer_name, email FROM reviewers ORDER BY reviewer_name DESC
SELECT title, abstract FROM manuscripts WHERE status = 'Under Review'
SELECT author_name, email FROM authors WHERE submitted_manuscripts > 3
SELECT editor_name, email FROM editors WHERE assigned_manuscripts < 5
SELECT * FROM reviewers WHERE assigned_manuscripts > 0
SELECT reviewer_name, email, assigned_manuscripts FROM reviewers WHERE reviewer_id = 1
SELECT manuscript_id, title, abstract, author_id FROM manuscripts WHERE status = 'Under Review' ORDER BY manuscript_id DESC
SELECT editor_name, email, assigned_manuscripts FROM editors WHERE assigned_manuscripts < 5 ORDER BY editor_name
SELECT comment_id, manuscript_id, reviewer_id, comment_text, comment_date FROM comments WHERE comment_date >= '2022-01-01'
